name: Fish In A Box
description:
Information

This game was made in 24 hours as a response to zyapguy's challenge to make a game in 24 hours!

Game developed by DevNugget.

Play as a pet fish of a doggo (totally not zyapguy), after a while the doggo is tired of you and gets a new pet fish but you refuse to leave!

I was mostly inspired by Undertale's battle system and Flappy Bird.

Controls

Move Up - W

Move Down - S

Move Left - A

Move Right - D

Selecting menu elements - Left Mouse Button
